task.title: Disassembling the Rear Axle and Differential
task.shortdesc: This task outlines the procedure for disassembling the rear axle and assembly after the universal joint has been disconnected.

prereq.p: The universal joint must be disconnected before beginning this procedure.

step.info: Remove the nuts from the front end of the radius rods
Remove the nuts on the studs that secure the drive shaft tube to the rear axle housing
Remove the bolts holding the two halves of the differential housing together

taskbody.result: The differential components will now be exposed for further disassembly.

postreq.note: When reassembling, ensure all pins, bolts, and keylocks are returned to their exact original positions.
